original_text: They were all filled with awe and praised God. “A great prophet has appeared among us,” they said. “God has come to help his people.”
korean_text: 모든 사람이 두려워하며 하나님께 영광을 돌려 이르되 큰 선지자가 우리 가운데 일어나셨다 하고 또 하나님께서 자기 백성을 돌보셨다 하더라

sentences.original_text: They were all filled with awe
A great prophet has appeared among us
God has come to help his people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 자기 백성을 돕기 위해 오셨다
